post:
Hi everyone, We are excited to let you know, we just opened another location within Equinix SG3 and finally completed Asia expansion!

To celebrate the launch of the SG location we've prepared a promotional offer. Please use the `SGLAUNCH` promotional code at the checkout for 30% off recurring price on ANY of our virtual servers in Singapore, valid until 30th Oct 2021.

## Offer

### S2N-1C1G

- CPU: 1 vCore
- RAM: 1GB DDR4 ECC
- Disk: 16GB RAID1 NVMe SSD
- Data Transfer: 1TB (highest of either your inbound traffic or your outbound traffic)
- Uplink: 2x40Gbps capped at 10Gbps

Price: $7 / mo <del> $10 / mo </del>
Use Coupon: `SGLAUNCH`
[Order](https://app.misaka.io/iaas/vm/create/sin03/s2n-1c1g)

>! Double memory when paid annually, PM us with your Order ID to get it :-)

Higher plans can be found on [our website](https://www.misaka.io/locations/sin03).

## Datacenter & Network Information

Datacenter: Equinix SG3
Transit: CDN77 (NTT, PCCW, Telia, Cogent, TATA), GSL Networks
Peering: Equinix Singapore, BBIX Singapore, SGIX

**NETWORK PERFORMANCE TO MAINLAND CHINA IS NOT OPTIMAL, PLEASE CONSIDER THIS BEFORE PLACING AN ORDER**

Test IP: 194.156.163.130 / 2407:b9c0:e002:2:5054:ff:fe63:9c50
Traceroute: https://ping.sx/mtr?p=misaka-sin

## Highlights of our services

- Intuitive, fast, in-house developed platform MC²
- IPv6 /64 subnet by default
- Reverse DNS (PTR) configuration via WebUI / API
- Daily built OS images with latest updates and patches (including Windows)
- First-class Support of BGP sessions and IPv6, they're working in all our locations except Seoul
- We own all hardware and IP space and operate our own network
